translation.Message_0_Page_0: Before we got here she got bit and was dying, we were hoping to find something that would help but all of a sudden she... got better somewhat. I don't know how it happened, but we are thankful, even though she's a little off from how she was before...
translation.Message_0_Page_1: I don't think the group could have handled another loss so soon, not after-... ...she's okay.
